summary: This is an email from an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York, dated July 27, 2021, inquiring about access to a Times article regarding Anouska de Georgiou and her claims of being a Jeffrey Epstein victim.

persons.name: Anouska de Georgiou
persons.context: Subject of a Times article referenced in the email, which discusses her claims of being a victim of Jeffrey Epstein.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Named in the subject of the article link as the perpetrator of the alleged abuse against Anouska de Georgiou.

connections.description: The referenced article discusses de Georgiou's claims of being a victim of Jeffrey Epstein.

events.title: AUSA inquiry about article
events.description: An Assistant United States Attorney sends an email inquiring about access to a Times article regarding Anouska de Georgiou and Jeffrey Epstein.

keyFacts: An Assistant United States Attorney from the SDNY was seeking access to a specific Times article on July 27, 2021.
The article in question was about Anouska de Georgiou and her claims of being a victim of Jeffrey Epstein.
The email suggests ongoing interest or investigation by the U.S. Attorney's Office into matters related to Jeffrey Epstein and his alleged victims.
